article_title: Lebanon fears new phase in Hezbollah-Israel fighting
sentence: The  latest  in  Gaza:  Israeli  strike  on  Gaza  school  kills  30  -  health  ministryHassan  Nasrallah,  the  long-time  Hezbollah  leader,  has  repeatedly  said  the  group  does  not  want  a  full-scale  war  with  Israel,  but  that  it  was  ready  for  one.
